news.image_caption: Join us at the Horizon Cloud Summit
news.content:
Weâ€™d like to invite you to join us at the virtual Horizon Cloud Summit next week, on December 8 and 9!


Our Geert Machtelinckx will be presenting & sharing in two different sessions. Find the full details here.


Horizon Cloud is a European Commission initiative. They recently recognized ThreeFoldâ€™s peer-to-peer cloud infrastructure as leading in the fields of edge, federation, and green technology.
news.excerpt: ThreeFold will be presenting two sessions at the Horizon Cloud Summit on December 8 and 9.
